blackberry lily: blackberry lily is a perennial plant with showy flowers that resemble blackberries, typically growing to 12-36 inches tall and 8-20 inches wide, with six petals and a yellow center.
blackberry lilies are often distinguished from other types of lilies by their rounded clusters of small flowers that are usually a deep reddish purple color.
